long_description: The Camp Chef popcorn popper lets you munch on fresh popcorn while taking in the sites and sounds in the best theater around: the great outdoors. Simply add some kernels to the Camp Chef popcorn popper and hold it over your campfire. 3.5 qt. capacity makes enough popcorn for the whole family to enjoy.
short_description: The Camp Chef popcorn popper lets you munch on fresh popcorn while taking in the sites and sounds in the best theater around: the great outdoors.
